Reviews.Title: good service
Reviews.Author: t24
Reviews.Content: I had never heard of this brand TV and was a little skeptical about buying it but this tv is just what we needed for the bedroom. It arrived very quickly. The sound and picture are great.  It was ready to use right out of the box. We can now read the words on the screen. I also like being able to plug my camcorder in to the USB port to view the videos of my kids activities after I tape them. We are thinking about buyiny a larger Haier TV for our livingroom

Reviews.Title: Just Fine
Reviews.Author: Jeremy S.
Reviews.Content: I guess they have a few bigger, flatter TVs out there now for around the same price.. Buuuut, this one looks just as good and it's super sturdy. I use it as my television but sometimes I'll do computer work on it :)

Reviews.Title: zimbob
Reviews.Author: zimbob
Reviews.Content: I purchased this LCD TV for my garage shop.  Therefore I didn't necassarily need 1080dpi to be fine.  It only had to perform in a saw dust environment which it has.  Set-up and operation was pretty straightforward.  Considering where it operates and it's $170 price tag, you cant beat it.  Happy camper.

Reviews.Title: A Snazzy Set
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I've been searching for a good gaming TV for a long time, something with a good picture, slim design, & little input lag. And this is exactly what I needed.
